|brand = Microsoft |model = MN-100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/05/2019‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Microsoft MN-100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = HEDACC300568 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 142300500600A |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = ADMtek;ADM5106;(X01-03620-01); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM7 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 75 <!-- 75 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;28F160C3BC70; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = Winbond;W986432DH-8; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:F2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel, reverse gender core |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header |jtag = yes,, 14-pad header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = WG3005C |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/31/2002 |estreldate = 09/19/2002 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007VWLK3G |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''[[Accton]]'' is the presumed manufacturer of this unit - they made the rest of Microsoft's :networking line-up from this era. The device label also seems to have an Accton P/N.
See also the [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/mn100/ Microsoft MN-100] on the ''Hardware Recycling Initiative'' website. :Per their site, the CPU X01-03620-01 ''appears to be ADM5106 compatible''. <!-- :CPU: M$ X01-03620-01 (ARM7TDMI) based (no-mmu) - appears to be adm5106 compatible :X01-03620-01; CONEXANT; LQFP208; --> *[[ADMtek]] ADM5106 @75MHz (ARM7TDMI, OS ThreadX), eq. [[Conexant]] CX84200-11
The power adapter included with the device is a ''Foxlink'' FA-4A030-1 (12VDC, 500mA). :It has a barrel connector with a reversed gender core (that is, it has a pin). <!-- *[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=67692 Internal shot on the DD-WRT forums] :{{WiFiCert|W000598|05/31/2002}}-->
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Mn100 soc.jpg| File:Mn500 991.jpg| File:Mn100 top.jpg| File:Mn100 bottom.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== *[[Microsoft MN-100]] - Ethernet Wired Base Station • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/mn100/ SF] :CPU: M$ X01-03620-01 (ARM7TDMI based, no-MMU) :Flash: [[Intel]] 28F160C3BC70 (2MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] W986432DH-8 (8MB) *[[Microsoft MN-110]] - [[ADMtek]] ADM8511 <!--(Pegasus II)--> • USB - ETH *[[Microsoft MN-120]] - [[ADMtek]] AN985B <!--(Centaur-B)--> • PCMCIA - ETH *[[Microsoft MN-500]] - Broadband Wireless Base Station :CPU: M$ X01-03620-01 (ARM7TDMI based, no-MMU) :Flash: ''SST'' SST39VF160-70 (2MB) :RAM: ''Micron'' MT48LC2M32B2TG-6F (8MB) :FCC ID: HEDACC300568 - [[Accton]] WG3005C-68 :• Microsoft MN-500 + MN-510 (USB) = MN-610 Kit *[[Microsoft MN-700]] - Wireless Router (FCC ID: C3KMN700) *[[Microsoft MN-740]] - Wireless Bridge (FCC ID: C3KMN740)
*[[Accton WG3005B1-17]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1 :CPU: [[ADMtek]] ADM5106, WLAN: AT76C502A/RF3000 :FCC ID: HEDWG3005B1-17 (Accton) 2002 *[[3Com OfficeConnect 3CRWE51196]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B :CPU: [[ADMtek]] ADM5106, WLAN: ISL3873B/ISL3685 :FCC ID: HEDWG3005BACC (Accton) 2002 *[[3Com OfficeConnect 3CRWE52196]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1-32 :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: HED3CRWE52196 (Accton) 2002 *[[Belkin F5D6231-4 v1]] - [[Accton]] WG3005C1-AK :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: K7SF5D6231-4 *[[SMC SMC7004VWBR v1]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1-17 :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: HEDWG3005B1-17, HEDACC2632WV2
